Goldman Sachs.eligibility: 3rd or final year engineering (all branches), MCA, BCA, BSc, MSc [2]

Microsoft.stpiend/ctc: Considered one of the best jobs in the country [3]
Microsoft.preparation strategy: Apply directly and keep an eye on reopening via Telegram [2, 3]

Uber.preparation strategy: Check specific links shared on Telegram [3, 4]

Google.program: Step Intern (Associate SWE Intern); Direct Hiring [4]
Google.eligibility: 2nd year (Step); 3rd year (Direct Intern); Final year (Direct Full-time) [4]
Google.Key note/How to prepare: Direct hiring for application engineering role is open for 2026 batch [4]
Google.preparation strategy: Stay updated through Telegram for direct links [4]

LinkedIn.timeline: April to May and September to December [5]
LinkedIn.Key note/How to prepare: Direct hiring often only opens for a few days [5]
LinkedIn.preparation strategy: Must be active on social media/Telegram to catch short windows [5]

Flipkart.program: Flipkart Grid; Runaway; Girls Who Code [6]
Flipkart.eligibility: All engineering students (Grid); Female students (Girls Who Code) [6]
Flipkart.Key note/How to prepare: Grid is a major hackathon open to all years [6]
Flipkart.preparation strategy: Review interview experiences available on the YouTube channel [6]

EI.preparation strategy: Build projects and practice solving case studies to present [7]

D.E. Shaw.Key note/How to prepare: Includes an offline event to learn about company work [8]
D.E. Shaw.preparation strategy: Share progress on social media to gain recruiter attention [8]

Walmart.eligibility: Varies by program; CodeHers is female-specific [8]
Walmart.Key note/How to prepare: Hackathons allow you to skip initial DSA/OA rounds [9]
Walmart.preparation strategy: Build MVPs quickly using tools like Replit and prompts [9]

Myntra.eligibility: 3rd and final year (Hacker Ramp); female candidates only (WeForShe) [10]
Myntra.Key note/How to prepare: Hacker Ramp is a generic program open to everyone [10]
Myntra.preparation strategy: Participate in hackathons and monitor social media for links [10]

Mercari.Key note/How to prepare: One of the highest stipends mentioned [11]
Mercari.preparation strategy: Watch specific video tutorials/guides for this program [11]

Atlassian.Key note/How to prepare: Timelines may shift based on company budgets [11]
Atlassian.preparation strategy: Monitor for openings 1 month earlier or later than usual [11]

Juspay.Key note/How to prepare: Hosted on Unstop or Hacker platforms [12]

At Fellowship.Key note/How to prepare: Mostly remote; requires 1-week visit to Delhi office [13]
At Fellowship.preparation strategy: Apply through links shared in the late summer [12]

Summer of Bitcoin.preparation strategy: Gain experience by working on open-source projects [13]
